confluencepro.panel.title=Confluence Migrator Pro ### Missing: confluencepro.extension.name=Confluence Migrator Pro ### Missing: confluencepro.extension.missingLicense=The application is running in trial mode. In order to unlock the full capabilities please obtain a license from the {0}. ### Missing: confluencepro.extension.missingLicense.label=administration section ### Missing: confluencepro.extension.notMainWiki=Confluence Migrations are managed on the {0}. ### Missing: confluencepro.extension.notMainWiki.link.label=main wiki ### Missing: confluencepro.zippicker.title=Select a confluence package to start the migration ### Missing: confluencepro.zippicker.placeholder=Pick a confluence export package... ### Missing: confluencepro.zippicker.button.submit=Migrate ### Missing: confluencepro.norights=Only the admin can perform the migration. ### Missing: confluencepro.upload.submit=Upload new package ### Missing: confluencepro.upload.cancel=Cancel selection ### Missing: confluencepro.packages.title=Step 2 - Choose an export package ### Missing: confluencepro.packages.hint=To start a migration, select an existing package or upload a new one. ### Missing: confluencepro.packages.serverPath={0}Select from server{1} ### Missing: confluencepro.packages.prefillUsing=For parameter values, prefill using: ### Missing: confluencepro.packages.prefillUsingDefaults=the default parameter values ### Missing: confluencepro.packages.prefillUsingLast=the parameter values used during the last migration ### Missing: confluencepro.packages.prefillUsingSpecified=the parameter values used during the following migration: ### Missing: confluencepro.packages.rememberPrefillConfig=Remember this choice for next time ### Missing: confluencepro.migrations.title=Your migrations ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.title=Step 1 - Prerequisites ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.hint=It is highly recommended to have all the prerequisites satisfied before proceeding with the migration. ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.completed=completed ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.incomplete=not completed ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.memory=Set -Xmx ({0}) and -Xms ({1}) to at least half the memory of the machine ({2} for {3} RAM). ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.notifications=Deactivate notifications in "xwiki.properties": "notifications.enabled" and "notifications.emails.enabled" (optional). ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.userNotifications=Deactivate notifications on your own profile ("never" for automatic page watching, disable page notifications). ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.userNotificationsCleanup=Clean the Notification Preferences (optional). ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.solr=To minimize migration duration, we recommend to ensure that the Solr queue is empty before starting the migration. Check the Solr queue size in the Wiki Administration, Solr Search Section (optional). ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.listener.docMoved=Deactivate Document Moved Listener (important for large spaces). ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.listener.automaticWatch=Deactivate Automatic Watch Mode Listener (important for large spaces). ### Missing: confluencepro.prerequisites.listener.liveNotification=Deactivate Live Notification Email Listener (important for large spaces). ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.success=Migration complete. See your report below. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.died=This migration died. This can happen if XWiki was restarted during the migration, or if something wrong happened. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.errored=A serious error prevented the migration from finishing. Please see the logs for details. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.canceled=This migration was canceled. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.title=The {0} imported pages from the {2} selected Confluence space(s) ({1} revisions) ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.imported.onespace.title=The {0} imported pages ({1} revisions) ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.title=Macros found during the migration ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.supported=Supported macros ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.notSupported=Unsupported macros ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.supported.icon.title=These macros are present in the XWiki instance and are either supported or partially supported. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.notSupported.icon.title=These macros are not present in the XWiki Instance but might be installable through the Extension Manager. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.notSupported.noMacros=There were no unsupported macros detected during the migration. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.supported.noMacros=There were no supported macros detected during the migration. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.macros.link=See the list of all confluence macros and their XWiki counterpart. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.logs.title=The logs of the migration ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.viewall.button=View all migrations ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.viewtext=View in text format ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.skipped.title={0} page(s) have encountered critical issues during the import ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.confluencerefs.title={0} page(s) contain references to missing pages ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.confluencerefs.info=This usually means that these pages link to pages from other spaces, and the Confluence package you used doesn't contain those spaces. Confluence reference were used to work around this issue. To avoid this, import the target spaces, and then reimport this one. We advice converting these Confluence references to proper links when the targeted pages are available. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.brokenLinks.title={0} page(s) have encountered link issues during the import ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.brokenLinks.info=This usually means that these pages link to pages from other spaces, and the Confluence package you used doesn't contain those spaces. Newer migrations will issue confluence reference to work around this issue. To avoid this, import the target spaces, and then reimport this one. We advice fixing these broken links when the targeted pages are available. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.missingUsersGroups.title=Missing users and groups ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.collisions.title=Reference collisions ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.collisions.info=The following references relate to several Confluence page titles. This means that those titles were translated to the same reference, and that the related pages overwrote each others during the migration ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.missingUsersGroups.info=These users and groups appear in rights imported from the Confluence package, but were not present the wiki in which Confluence Migrator Pro ran. This is only an issue if you expected all the users and groups to exist in this wiki before migrating this content. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.missingUsersGroups.users=Missing users: ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.missingUsersGroups.groups=Missing groups: ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.done.title={0} page(s) have encountered issues during the import ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.other.title=Other issue were encountered during the import ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.confluencerefs.list=List of targeted but missing pages ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.brokenLinks.list=List of pages targeted by potentially broken links ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.unhandledParameters.title=There are {0} unhandled macro parameters or parameter values ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.unhandledParameters.info=Unhandled parameter warnings: ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.unhandledParameterValues.info=Unhandled parameter values warnings: ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.problems.unhandledParameters.list=The unhandled parameter (values), per macro ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.macroName=Macro enable JavaScript to see the logs ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.raport.displayFullLog=Display full logs ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.title.label=Set the title of the migration ### confluencepro.migration.missingLicense=As part of a trial, you can migrate one space per migration. In order to unlock the full capabilities please obtain a license. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.migratepropsdocsave=Migrated JSON properties to attachments ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.propertiessuccessfullymigrated=Migrated properties to attachments. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.nopropertiestomigrate=No properties to migrate. ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.doc.title=Migration ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable._actions=Actions ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable._actions.select=Select package ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.job_status=Migration status ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.executed=Is executed? ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.doc.date=Date ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.doc.author=Creator ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.running=Running ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.canceled=Canceled ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.died=Died ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.errored=Errored ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.none=Not started ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.waiting=Waiting ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.livetable.state.done=Done ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.popup.title=Insert the title of the migration ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.popup.placeholder=Type the migration title... ### Missing: confluencepro.migration.popup.startMigration=Start migration ### Missing: confluencepro.macros.title=Imported macros ### Missing: confluencepro.macros.link=For more information about supported and unsupported macros, please visit our dedicated page. ### Missing: confluencepro.macros.livetable.name=Macro name ### Missing: confluencepro.macros.livetable.occurrences=Occurrences ### Missing: confluencepro.macros.livetable.pages=Present in pages ### Missing: confluencepro.macros.livetable.supported=Is supported? ### Missing: confluencepro.macros.pages.title=The pages where "{0}" macro is present ### Missing: confluencepro.macros.pages.noMacro=No macro selected. ### Missing: confluencepro.macros.pages.missingData=There is no data on this macro. ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.title=Select the Confluence spaces you want to import. ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.additionalInfo.documentsCount=Documents: ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.additionalInfo.attachmentsCount=Attachments: ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.selectAll=Select all ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.search.placeholder=Search for a space... ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.showMore.message={0} more spaces available. ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.showMore.link=Load more.. ### Missing: confluencepro.job.interrupt.button=Interrupt ### Missing: confluencepro.job.status.readingPackage=Importing the Confluence package. This may take a while.. ### Missing: confluencepro.job.status.runningJob=Your pages are being imported and moved into the correct location. This may take a while.. ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.advanced.link=Advanced migration options ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.advanced.input=Properties of the input filter stream (Confluence XML) ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.advanced.output=Properties of the output filter stream (XWiki instance) ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.advanced.source=The source package ### Missing: confluencepro.job.question.advanced.source.description=The path to the package that will be migrated e.g. file://home/user/Downloads/confluencePackage.zip. You can also give the path to a directory containing the unzipped package (an entity.xml file and an attachments folder). ### Missing: confluencepro.job.general.title=General parameters ### Missing: confluencepro.job.skipquestions.question.title=Skip the space selection screen ### Missing: confluencepro.job.skipquestions.question.hint=If you check this, all spaces will be imported. Note: the screen will always be skipped if the Confluence package contains only one space, regardless the value of this parameter. ### Missing: confluencepro.job.onlyrights.question.hint=If you have already migrated your content and wish to import Confluence rights without modifying the content, you can do so setting this option to "true". ### Missing: confluencepro.job.onlyrights.warning=If you set this field to true, options in the next section will be ignored (because the default instance output filter stream is replaced with a custom one). ### Missing: confluencepro.job.onlyrights.question.title=Only import rights ### Missing: confluencepro.job.onlyattachments.question.hint=If you have already migrated your content and wish to import attachments (and attachment history) without modifying the content, you can do so setting this option to "true". Existing attachments won't be replaced. Note: make sure to import history if you want to import the attachment history. ### Missing: confluencepro.job.onlyattachments.question.title=Only import attachments ### Missing: confluencepro.job.linkmapping.title=Link Mapping ### Missing: confluencepro.job.linkmapping.description=Link Mapping lets the migrator collect information about spaces and documents as Confluence packages are analysed in order to produce the right links when pages link to other pages that are not in the same Confluence export package (for instance when using space exports). ### Missing: confluencepro.job.savelinkmapping.question.title=Update link mapping ### Missing: confluencepro.job.savelinkmapping.question.hint=Save information about documents in this package so links to these documents in migrations will work. This includes documents that are not in the spaces selected for import. You can disable this behavior by setting this to false. ### Missing: confluencepro.job.onlylinkmapping.question.title=Only build link mapping ### Missing: confluencepro.job.onlylinkmapping.question.hint=Set this to true if this migration should exclusively be used for building link mapping. No spaces will be imported. ### Missing: confluencepro.job.linkmapping.title=Link Mapping ### Missing: confluencepro.job.linkmapping.description=Link Mapping lets the migrator collect information about spaces and documents as Confluence packages are analysed in order to produce the right links when pages link to other pages that are not in the same Confluence export package (for instance when using space exports). ### Missing: confluencepro.job.savelinkmapping.question.title=Update link mapping ### Missing: confluencepro.job.savelinkmapping.question.hint=Save information about documents in this package so links to these documents in migrations will work. This includes documents that are not in the spaces selected for import. You can disable this behavior by setting this to false.
